meanings.definition: A public square or marketplace in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: In the ancient Roman fora, people gathered to trade goods.
meanings.sent2: The forum was the central fora where Romans conducted business.
meanings.sent3: The bustling fora in Rome were filled with merchants selling their wares.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a marketplace, bustling with ideas and thoughts like a vibrant fora.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ancient Roman fora was etched in his memory, vivid and grand.
